meanings.sent1: She walked into the party unembarrassed by her outfit.
meanings.sent2: He spoke confidently and unembarrassed in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Even when she tripped, she remained unembarrassed and laughed it off.
meanings.sent4: His unembarrassed attitude towards failure inspired others to try harder.
meanings.sent5: The unembarrassed way he danced made everyone smile.

meanings.sent1: The child was unembarrassed when he spilled juice on the table.
meanings.sent2: She faced the criticism unembarrassed, showing no signs of guilt.
meanings.sent3: His unembarrassed reaction to the prank surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unembarrassed display of bold colors caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The unembarrassed expression on her face revealed her confidence.

meanings.definition: Not hindered by embarrassment or self-consciousness
meanings.sent1: The comedian delivered his jokes unembarrassed by the audience's reactions.
meanings.sent2: She sang karaoke unembarrassed, enjoying every moment on stage.
meanings.sent3: The unembarrassed way he asked for a second helping of cake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unembarrassed approach to challenges impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unembarrassed way he shared his personal stories inspired others to open up.
